name: 8i - Make VR Human
description: Immersive experiences featuring real people in volumetric VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 970 DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or greater Processor: Intel i5-6400 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 980 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11
